revised_title: Inauguration of the International Geophysical Year and its Impact
tldr: The article discusses the inauguration of the International Geophysical Year (IGY) and the various events and activities held to mark the occasion. It highlights the participation of distinguished guests, including H.R.H. Prince Philip, Duke of Edinburgh, and the Society's involvement in promoting the IGY program through exhibitions, television programs, and publications. The IGY aimed to study various aspects of Earth and space, fostering international collaboration and scientific research.
